tileset_metadata.name: Village Interior - Mei Jian Chi's Home

tiles.description: Crude mud wall with visible cracks and earthy texture.
Mud wall section featuring a small dark rat hole at the base.
tiles.reference_quote: Stuck the torch into a small hole in the mud wall.

tiles.description: Packed dirt flooring, uneven and worn.
Worn wooden planks, vertical and horizontal variants.
Simple wooden bed frame with a woven straw mat.
A wooden board used at the head of the bed.
tiles.reference_quote: Lifted the board at the head of the bed.
Scratching along the inner wall of the jar.

tiles.description: An old, unused stove/furnace, black with soot.
Old wooden clothes chest, showing signs of heavy wear and decay.
Small wooden bucket/vessel for food or water storage.
A farming hoe with a wooden handle and metal head.
tiles.reference_quote: took a hoe from behind the door
